info.name: Purple and Gold userstyles.org
info.description: Ok....I do not want this style to be obsoleted by anyone....Why? Because I didn't copy it!!!! OK? I never did copy anything.............. This style takes the normal Userstyles.org and makes it a cool shade of purple and yellow. For any reference please say by Kevin Rampling. In any videos you may take with this in it, in the corner, please make a little notation saying: By: Kevin Rampling. Enjoy!
